Lesson 3: Interactivity in Visual Analytics: Principles and Methods

Published

January 16, 2023

Content

  • Different types of interaction techniquee
  • The role of Interaction in visual analytics
  • The concept of linked multiple views
  • Interactive analytics best practices

Lesson Slides and Hands-on Notes

  • Lesson slides in html and pdf formats

  • Handout of Hands-on Exercise 3 in html and pdf formats.

Readings

Core readings

  • Dynamics for Visual Analysis
